pages.text: This glistening hoop creates a protective film of air around you.$(br)It not only protects you from enemy projectiles, but can even cushion a deep fall.$(br)The Puff Circlet also prevents Farmland from being trampled.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)Gone are the days when skeletons sniped you from behind in an unforeseen moment.
